titleStmt.title: The antapology of the melancholy stander-by in answer to the dean of St. Paul's late book, falsly stiled, An apology for writing against the Socinians, &c.
titleStmt.author: Wettenhall, Edward, 1636-1713.

notesStmt.note: Page 6 is cropped and p. 38 print is faded in filmed copy. Pages beginning-39 photographed from Bodleian Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
